data.name: Magik
data.description: Magik uses dark sorcery to charge up her allies and her mutant teleportation power to get the drop on enemies. As the demonic Darkchylde, she can inflict heavy damage.

starItems.name: Magik
starItems.description: Magik uses dark sorcery to charge up her allies and her mutant teleportation power to get the drop on enemies. As the demonic Darkchylde, she can inflict heavy damage.

1.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

2.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect from each target

3.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

4.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>125%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

5.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects

6.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

7.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>230%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.
Reduce the Speed Bar of primary target by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

Apply +<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>20</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>CHARGEABLE UNCANNY X-MEN</color> allies.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
Reduce the Speed Bar of primary target by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

Apply +<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>20</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>CHARGEABLE UNCANNY X-MEN</color> allies.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing to all enemies
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> on all enemies

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>125%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
Reduce the Speed Bar of primary target by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

Apply +<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>20</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>CHARGEABLE UNCANNY X-MEN</color> allies.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
Reduce the Speed Bar of primary target by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

Apply +<color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>20</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>CHARGEABLE UNCANNY X-MEN</color> allies.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Always flip <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>175%</color> Piercing + flip <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
Reduce the Speed Bar of primary target by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

Apply +<color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>20</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>CHARGEABLE UNCANNY X-MEN</color> allies.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>225%</color> Piercing + flip <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
Reduce the Speed Bar of primary target by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

Apply +<color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>20</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>CHARGEABLE UNCANNY X-MEN</color> allies.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing + flip <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
Reduce the Speed Bar of primary target by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

Apply +<color=#86e619>10</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>20</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>CHARGEABLE UNCANNY X-MEN</color> allies.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>5%</color> Drain.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Barrier self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health

3.description:
Barrier self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>5%</color> Drain.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>35%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain
Clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies

4.description:
Barrier self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>175%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>15%</color> Drain.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>75%</color> damage to primary target
Barrier <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health

5.description:
Barrier self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>15%</color> Drain.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

6.description:
Barrier self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary target
Barrier all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies
Clear <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies

7.description:
Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>450%</color> damage + Drain <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
On Spawn, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When an enemy attacks an <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>20</color>.  If that ally is Colossus or Kitty Pryde, instead gain +<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>20</color>.

At the end of any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>20</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack the enemy with the highest Damage for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage, then lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On Turn, if an ally Phoenix has died and Dark Phoenix is currently not an ally, summon Dark Phoenix. This can only trigger once per match.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to enemy with highest Damage
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain

2.description:
On Spawn, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When an enemy attacks an <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>20</color>.  If that ally is Colossus or Kitty Pryde, instead gain +<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>20</color>.

At the end of any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>20</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack the enemy with the highest Damage for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage, then lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On Turn, if an ally Phoenix has died and Dark Phoenix is currently not an ally, summon Dark Phoenix. This can only trigger once per match.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain. <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to enemy with highest Damage
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Armor
<color=#fff568>UNCANNY X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Armor

3.description:
On Spawn, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

At the end of any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>20</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack the enemy with the highest Damage for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage, then lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On Turn, if an ally Phoenix has died and Dark Phoenix is currently not an ally, summon Dark Phoenix. This can only trigger once per match.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain. <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain.
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>UNCANNY X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Armor.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to enemy with highest Damage
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain

4.description:
On Spawn, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.
When an enemy attacks an <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally, gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>20</color>.
